channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Weapons’ Has The Best Horror Rotten Tomatoes Critic Score This Decade
item.description: Weapon reviews paint is as the best horror movie of the decade with its new Rotten Tomatoes score, which has yet to falter.

item.title: NYT ‘Connections’ Hints For Thursday, August 7: Today’s Clues And Answers

item.title: ‘Gradius Origins’ Review: Shoot ‘Em Up Blast From The Past
item.description: This massive collection of over one dozen versions of classic Gradius titles is well-worth checking out for casual and hardcore fans alike.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Thursday, August 7
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.
